name: Capsuworm
description:
A simple puzzle game with the goal of getting to the yellow block. This game is still in development and is looking for feedback on stuff that could be added.

Helpful Guide:

To finish level 1 you must take out both of the front legs of the table, then you can climb onto it like a ramp.

To finish level 2 you must find the hidden yellow block.

For level 3 you must either use Cylinder as an obstacle to launch yourself up, or you could try to launch yourself up normally as long as the Capsule is standing tall.

For level 4 once you get onto the first platform you must lay your character flat on the wall and while holding the up arrow key, press the left/right arrow key and you should be able to climb the wall, you must try to climb onto the second platform.

For level 5 try to get on top of the flying platforms, this way you can jump off of it onto the giant yellow block.
